localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: As usual, Nordic countries performed best overall in the latest glass-ceiling index from The Economist, with Sweden, Iceland, Finland and Norway taking the top four spots https://t.co/crrctBlbtW
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 和往常一样，北欧国家在《经济学人》最新的玻璃天花板指数中整体表现最好，瑞典、冰岛、芬兰和挪威占据了前四名https://t.co/crrctBlbtW。
和往常一樣，北歐國家在《經濟學人》最新的玻璃天花板指數中整體表現最好，瑞典、冰島、芬蘭和挪威佔據了前四名https://t.co/crrctBlbtW。

previous.title: "Do your best", she always said. Love what you do. Be constantly curious. And learn that it is not dumb to ask a question. Our obituary for the mathematician from 2020 #IWD2021 https://t.co/KkHf6vklDh

localize.full_text: 她总是说："尽力而为"。热爱你所做的事情。要不断好奇。并学会提出问题并不笨。我们的讣告从2020年开始数学家#IWD2021https://t.co/KkHf6vklDh。
她總是說："盡力而爲"。熱愛你所做的事情。要不斷好奇。並學會提出問題並不笨。我們的訃告從2020年開始數學家#IWD2021https://t.co/KkHf6vklDh。

next.title: Safe and productive nuclear power plants are being closed across the world. But to hasten their decline is to wilfully hobble the world in the greatest environmental struggle of all https://t.co/KVrD69A75j

localize.full_text: 世界各地正在关闭安全和高效的核电站。但是，加速核电站的衰落就是故意阻碍世界进行最伟大的环境斗争https://t.co/KVrD69A75j。
世界各地正在關閉安全和高效的核電站。但是，加速核電站的衰落就是故意阻礙世界進行最偉大的環境鬥爭https://t.co/KVrD69A75j。
